biography: Tracy Pfau has British, Scottish, Irish and Yakima Indian heritage. She plays strong character roles with dialects, mostly from Europe and rural America. In her spare time, Tracy Pfau is an animal advocate. She can spend a whole day saving a squirrel, if she sees one injured, to give an example. She has nursed many critters back to health. Her long-term plan is to buy a ranch for her menagerie of animals, act and create, and take care of her husband, Stephen Jared, who she has adored for 27 glorious years.
name: Tracy Pfau
